Observation of lacustrine fauna and mangroves

activities.text: Short hike on marked trails of the Red Tsingy (photography at viewpoints)
Observation of dry flora and small endemic baobabs

Observation of the coastline and surface marine fauna

Observation of chameleons and camouflaged geckos (without handling)

activities.text: Road journey Ankarana → Ambanja → Ankify
Speedboat crossing Ankify → Nosy Be (variable calm sea)
Late afternoon walk on Madirokely beach
Free swimming and coastal snorkeling (weather permitting)
Safety/navigation route briefing (Nosy Be port)

visits.text: Nosy Iranja (double islet connected by a sand tombolo)

activities.text: Offshore navigation Nosy Sakatia → Nosy Iranja
